column4: hi. can anyone help me please? my mouse freezes for 1 sec, every 5 seconds. very unnerving. iv changed the grub lines and added acpi=off and acpi=force irqpoll, then sudo grup-update. nothing changed. help anyone?
is the system a branded PC or laptop?
do you have the latest BIOS?
ok when it stops, run: dmesg | tail    what is output (use a pastebin to hold the text)
[ 3773.488746] hub 7-0:1.0: port 1 disabled by hub (EMI?), re-enabling...
ok, what is the output of:  lsmod    Thanks
and the output of:  lsmod    Thanks
ok try:  echo "options psmouse synaptics_resume_reset=N" | sudo tee /etc/modprobe.d/psmouse_fix.conf      then rebot to test
